text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet ValueSet-R5-composition-status-for-R4

This value set expansion contains 7 concepts.

SystemVersionCodeDisplayDefinition
http://hl7.org/fhir/composition-status5.0.0  appendedAppendedSubsequent to being final, the composition content has been modified by adding new content. The existing content is unchanged.
http://hl7.org/fhir/composition-status5.0.0  cancelledCancelledThe composition is unavailable because the measurement was not started or not completed (also sometimes called "aborted").
http://hl7.org/fhir/composition-status5.0.0  correctedCorrectedSubsequent to being final, the composition content has been modified to correct an error in the composition or referenced results.
http://hl7.org/fhir/composition-status5.0.0  deprecatedDeprecatedThis composition has been withdrawn or superseded and should no longer be used.
http://hl7.org/fhir/composition-status5.0.0  partialPartialThis is a partial (e.g. initial, interim or preliminary) composition: data in the composition may be incomplete or unverified.
http://hl7.org/fhir/composition-status5.0.0  registeredRegisteredThe existence of the composition is registered, but there is nothing yet available.
http://hl7.org/fhir/composition-status5.0.0  unknownUnknownThe authoring/source system does not know which of the status values currently applies for this observation. Note: This concept is not to be used for "other" - one of the listed statuses is presumed to apply, but the authoring/source system does not know which.

name: ValueSetR5CompositionStatusForR4
title: Cross-version ValueSet R5.CompositionStatus for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents content from http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/composition-status|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4 that is appropriate for use but unavailable in `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/composition-status|4.0.1`.
purpose:
This value set is part of the cross-version definitions generated to enable use of the
value set `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/composition-status|5.0.0` as defined in FHIR R5
in FHIR R4.

The source value set is bound to the following FHIR R5 elements:
* `Composition.status` as Required
* `DocumentReference.docStatus` as Required

Across FHIR versions, the value set has been mapped as:
* `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/composition-status|5.0.0`
* `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/composition-status|4.3.0`
* `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/composition-status|4.0.1`

The following concepts are not included in this cross-version definition because they have valid representations
* `http://hl7.org/fhir/composition-status#amended`
* `http://hl7.org/fhir/composition-status#entered-in-error`
* `http://hl7.org/fhir/composition-status#final`
* `http://hl7.org/fhir/composition-status#preliminary`

Following are the generation technical comments:
One or more source concepts are either not mapped or broader than their targets, so the value set relationship is broadened.
The source value set has more active concepts (11) than the target (4), so the source is broader than the target.
All concepts in the comparison are listed as identical.
The source and target value sets have the same number of active concepts (4).
Using explicit mapping from `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/composition-status|5.0.0` to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/composition-status|4.0.1` in `http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/xver/5.0/ConceptMap/R5-CompositionStatus-R4-CompositionStatus` (`ConceptMap-R5-CompositionStatus-R4-CompositionStatus.json`)
